name: Woes of the White Forest
effectText: Special Summon 1 "White Forest" monster from your hand or Deck, then immediately after this effect resolves, you can Synchro Summon 1 "White Forest" Synchro Monster. If this card is sent to the GY to activate a monster effect: You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Woes of the White Forest" once per turn.
